item.title: Custom file handling
item.description: Long press the settings button, check the option "custom file handling" to enable the functionality. The custom file handling configuration file is "/sdcard/uweb/default.filecap", each line of it has the format as follows: [file extension]:[mimetype]:[command line] The "[file extension]" part can have at most two-segment of extensions such as "txt.xz","html.gz". "[mimetype]" indicates the type of "[command line]" output. "[command line]" is same as the one in default.cmds. The most often used replacements are:
